Name: Aerogard
Details: A popular range of Insect replellents originally during the Twenyith Century on 'Terra Australis' was designed to repel 'Mozzies'. It's surprining how far those little blood suckers have spread even into The Periphery. NOw is effective against all types of Stingers, Wasps, Cicadas, and most other annoying insects. Never leave home without it and avagoodweekend!
